i_about_text_1: I'm a passionate computer engineering graduate and Big Data Master's student at the University of Santiago de Compostela, motivated to launch my professional career in data engineering and software development. I'm seeking opportunities where I can apply my technical knowledge, continue learning, and contribute to innovative projects, complementing academic training with practical experience in challenging environments.
i_about_text_2: My technical expertise spans from frontend development with React to backend systems with Node.js, and data analysis with Python and R. I'm eager to apply these skills in professional settings while continuously expanding my knowledge in big data technologies and software engineering.
i_contact_text: Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following platforms or send me a message directly. I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, projects, or just having a chat about technology.
